# simd_quaternion(_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

-  simd_quaternion(_:) 

Function# simd_quaternion(_:)



```
func simd_quaternion(_ matrix: simd_half3x3) -> simd_quath
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/simd/simd_quaternion(_:)-2er3f#discussion)

Construct a quaternion from a 3x3 rotation `matrix`.

If `matrix` is not orthogonal with determinant 1, the result is undefined.
